description: This Python script demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous accuracy evaluation using the agno evaluation framework, involving setting up an agent, model, and tools, then running the evaluation asynchronously.

classes.name: AccuracyEval
classes.description: Class representing an accuracy evaluation process.

classes.name: AccuracyResult
classes.description: Class representing the result of an accuracy evaluation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent with a model and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Class representing an OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: CalculatorTools
classes.description: Class providing calculator tools for the agent.

methods.name: arun
methods.description: Asynchronous method to run the accuracy evaluation.
